page.title: 05Motorway Services, Aust
page.content: Aust Motorway Service Area contains a big building which houses a large self-service shop; restaurant;transport drivers club and telephones.There are large car parks for cars , lorries,and coaches,an adventure playground and picnic areas.The area is attractively landscaped and provides a pleasant environment for travellers wishing to take a break.From the grass banks there are marvellous views of the Severn Road Bridge,the River Severn and the surrounding countryside .For motorists who are in need of techincal assistance permanent AA and RAC patrols are stationed at the services.
